author: ajewa
title: Effective Marketing; How to Market a New Product
body:
A business is not existing if there is not market for such business be it goods market or service market. I was talking to a young boy some time back and he said he wanted to start selling Soda and can drinks. While we were discussing, I asked how he was going to conquer the market and he sounded really confused. He thought his market was the place where the buying and selling occurred, he was talking about having a large space in a random sales place/ market place which made me understood that he was really confused and needed a lot of understanding about business and marketing.

### What is a Market?
Unlike what the person you read above said, a business market is a group of potential buyers who have needs and wants and possess the purchasing power to satisfy them is known as a business market. The people who consume goods, services, ideas, and thoughts are the market of a business enterprise.

Do not get this wrong, because you have a million people in a community do not mean a million person are your mar
root_title: Effective Marketing; How to Market a New Product

author: ajewa
title: How to keep customers; Learning Competitive Advantage
body:
What makes Starbucks superior to the café close to your house is what we will be discussing today. I watched a documentary about Walmart that store owners were complaining about the fact that they tend not to have any customer in their shops once there is a Walmart outlet/store in their environment (this is based on documentary, there is no Walmart in my region so I can’t say but the fact that when a bigger brand comes to a location where smaller brands are, they tend to overshadow them). This happens because of something called **Competitive Advantage**

<center>![images (51).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQA2wo6ik1GUVsq3JWgZW8D595N4RLe2TCkohmNn4z6A3/images%20(51).jpeg)
*https://pixnio.com*</center>

If I ask you to get me a very good coffee to drink, I am sure you go to Starbucks not minding if there is a small café beside it. Competitive Advantage is what a service, product or goods superior to others in the sight of a customer. I even notice that competitive advantage works in organizations, prod
root_title: How to keep customers; Learning Competitive Advantage

author: ajewa
title: The Shadows of the Medici Bank
body:
“There is in the garden of plant which one ought to leave dry, although most people water it. It is the weed called Envy” – Cosimo Medici

The Medici family was a prominent family who made their prominence through commerce rather than bloodline marriage. The Medici family owned the Medici bank created in the 15th century, the family owned a lot of art works and the power of Florence but it is painful that the family could lose power, affluence and wealth. In the history of Europe, the Medici name cannot be overlooked as they were in power for hundreds of years and were a powerful influence in Europe.


![images (24).jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUiwc2pJFQh9eMVedFokHA4uXhYL2ZU9psWa7afu4boEy/images%20(24).jpeg)
[Source](https://thefinanser.com/2019/02/banks-need-technology-giants.html/medici-bank-15th-century-granger/)

It is believed that the Medici family were into politics in the 13th century but the family grasping power wasn’t known until the 14th and 15th century with the creation of **The Medic

What is your first reaction when a person tells you they are about to quit their job so as to start a small business? You know it is quite easy to support a person who wants to get married, or buying a new building to supporting him/her to start a new business. This is because there are no guarantees that the business will be a success and there are going to be a lot of obstacles, so giving your maximum support might be very difficult. 



The life of an entrepreneur is a life full of ups and downs. Becoming an entrepreneur is nerve-wracking, difﬁcult, time-consuming, overwhelming, fun, productive, uncertain, goal oriented and challenging.

author: ajewa
title: Trade Wars And Your Thoughts
body:
Trade wars can be very interesting to hear from the news if you aren’t a citizen of the countries involved. It is like looking at a fight outside the boxing ring and watching the two boxers tear themselves up with punches.

### What Is a Trade War?
The implementation of protectionist trade barriers such as tariffs and or quotas on importation by a country which is followed by a retaliatory of such or worse implementation by the government of other country is called Trade war. In most cases, the reason for implementation of tariffs and quotas on imports could be to improve locally produced products, to fight against discrimination against a foreign country in the trade market, to serve as a warning to a foreign country that the local country is still the economic and trade power for the foreign country.

A lot of trade wars have occurred which usually affects the nations involved. Let’s take a look at a trade war;

#### Banana Trade War
If you are hearing about Banana trade war for the first time, do not mist
root_title: Trade Wars And Your Thoughts

body:
Have you been to a store to buy goods, only to be convinced by the salesperson that another product is better than the one you are about to choose? author: ajewa
title: Why Market Price Fluctuates As A Trader.
body:
The market is made up of three sets of people, the scalpers, the speculators and the hedgers. This three set of people make up the market. 

The scalpers are traders who make profit from the bid and ask margin willing to go with the little profit made from their trades. The scalpers are always on the market waiting for every rise and watching every drop, they are always setting prices that will fetch little profits per trade which accumulates after several trades.

The Speculators are traders who trade for long-term. They trade with the hope to profit from the commodity price at a long run. They speculate for a longer time unlike that of the scalpers.

Hedgers are mostly companies trying to hedge a product which is very valuable to their product. They stay on the market so as to keep the price stable and prevent unnecessary rise in price.

https://business.nasdaq.com/media/TRADE_L1_Pillar_headline_Graphs_o_tcm5044-9478.jpg
[source](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwi
root_title: Why Market Price Fluctuates As A Trader.

title: Attending To A Rage Customer's Complain (Customer Care 101)
body:
Have you attended to a complaining customer who is really bitter over something that you never expect to cause such bitterness? Well, that is often not a new things when it comes to attending to customers but the ability to curtail and handle it properly is the key.

Certain times, some customers come to lay complains that is by no chance related to the business, the employee attending to the customer, the product or the services, it might be a third party contractor or maybe another member of staff. In most cases you just got to the wrong place at the wrong timing. Most times the customer goes so hard on you that you wonder why this is happening. Trust me, this is inevitable  most especially with business and humans.

With the customers having a lot of things running their minds, they might become a ready fuel for an unjust spark of complain over something trivial or nothing at all. At the point, the employee or customer service take certain steps to make the customer happy which includes;

body:

body:

author: ajewa
title: Writing From A Troubled Heart
body:
What if I tell you how confused I get sometimes,
Sometimes I feel I am a stranger to my own self,
I get scared of making decisions,
Because I do not know if it is the right or wrong one,
I feel helpless and hopeless.

https://thoughtcatalog.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/alex-iby-280624.jpg?w=1140
[Image Credit](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=imgres&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwjRpYWd_cbcAhWH4IUKHbg1DosQjRx6BAgBEAU&url=https%3A%2F%2Fthoughtcatalog.com%2Fdhang-magracia%2F2017%2F06%2Fread-this-if-you-have-a-troubled-heart%2F&psig=AOvVaw2Qdys1wV1dfNbuwppvIRP4&ust=1533045376734284)

If someone should ask if I trust myself now,
I think my answer will be a capital No,
Because even the things I thought I could not do,
They have become what I have made a constant habit now.

I guess I am stuck in the middle of nowhere,
Looking for a means of escape,
I am left to make my own decisions,
Which is to either accept my fate and get back on my feet,
Or stay the way I feel depressed I am.

If someone s
root_title: Writing From A Troubled Heart

author: ajewa
title: Success is a must, not an option
body:
Have you heard people say that nothing is meaningful until you are successfulooking, if you haven't heard that before, then you are hearing it from me now.

 life is like a combination lock your job is to find the right numbers, in the right orders, so you can have anything you want. I hope that is understandable.

![IMG_20180704_185845.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUC9pY3raF9V1CHjFKvXbGaiZT8WXvdAniipo7PC7DaWS)



One problem we have is that we do not want to stressourselves.  we never want to do anything stressful at all. You want to enjoy everything without passing through nothing.

" if we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally outstand ourselves." Thomas edison.

Work not something we should beg ourselves to do, attaining success should be our pirsuit and not something that is unattainable.
root_title: Success is a must, not an option

author: ajewa
title: Taking Charge Of Your Life
body:
### YOU HAVE STAYED TOO LONG HERE

Living life is a big task but so many of us do not know this. A lot of people believe that their life is being controlled by one outside force or person, they believe that their way of life is being determined by others.

This mindset has turned a lot of people to living liabilities as they spend most of their life doing absolutely nothing but live the day as it comes by. They use every minute of their life doing nothing or living for others. 

Some years back, a man was found sitting on a bench along the road. He was holding a small clock and was raising his head up and down at every tick. He did this continuously and he was counting 19975,  19976, ..... He did this continuously and I was forced to ask him why he did this he said to me. I decided to this today because I want to feel how it is wasting time doing the unnecessary thinking you are doing the right thing because you feel exhausted. Then I asked him, are you exhausted? He replied yes but I still want to continue
root_title: Taking Charge Of Your Life

author: ajewa
title: 부자와 가난한 자 ... 왜 부자는 부자가되고 가난한자는 가난합니까?
body:
질문 : 부자와 가난한 자 ... 왜 부자는 더 부유합니까? 가난한자는 가난합니까? 

나는 물리학이 우리에게 가르쳐 준 것과 반대로 유인하는 것들을 발견했다. 부자가 부자가된다는 것은 부자와 부자와의 부유 한 움직임이 똑같이한다는 것을 잊지 않고 더 부자가된다는 뉴스는 아닙니다. 

부자는 부자들과 결혼하여 가난한 사람들이 그들에게 더 가까이 오지 못하게하려고한다. 가난한 사람들이 가난하다고 생각하고 같은 깃털의 새들이 함께 모여 들었다고 느끼기 때문에 가난한 사람들은 부자와 가까이 가지 않으려 고 시도하지 않습니다. 

이 두 가지의 차이는 너무 커서 갭을 비교할 수 없습니다. 

두 사람 사이의이 간격을 왜 닫을 수 없습니까?
root_title: 부자와 가난한 자 ... 왜 부자는 부자가되고 가난한자는 가난합니까?

title: What Will You Do?
body:
**Question:** What Will You Do?

Everybody has one thing or the other under their sleeves that bites them. So many people try to keep it to themselves so well but at the end of the day, they end up coming out asking for help.

Let's solve this puzzle together. 

These were words written by a young man who came to ask for help. In his words he said

"What do I do, My wife has a child for my friend and my father but I trained them till they are 10 and 8 respectively.  I do not have a child to call mine. Please I need advice, what do I do to my wife, my father, my friend and the children. I'm loosing it here.

author: ajewa
title: The Rich And The Poor... why do the rich get richer and the poor get poorer?
body:
**Question:** The Rich And The Poor... why do the rich get richer and the poor get poorer?

I have noticed that like things attract which is inverse to what physics taught us. It is not more a news that the rich get richer, not forgetting that the rich move with the rich and the poor do the same alike.

The rich wants to get married to the rich not allowing the poor come closer to them. The poor never tries to go close to the rich because they feel that they are meant to be poor and feel birds of the same feather flocks together. 

The difference between this two is too much and the gap cannot be compared.

Why can't this gap between the two be closed?

___
[Posted on What Q&A - The Q&A App on the STEEM Blockchain](https://steemit.com/@what-app)
___

author: ajewa
title: Technology has come to stay: Simple Robotic Appliances for Household Chores.
body:
House chores can be really annoying to perform sometimes and I am sure that quite a good number of people find it difficult to raise a finger after the day's work.
Weekends should be for relaxation but that is the time when we also have to clean up and do everything that our busy schedule could not permit us to do during the week.
Even those who work from home are not left out of the laziness to perform household chores, but through all the stress, we can now smile because technology once again has come through for us.

There are various technological instruments that makes household chores an easy task to perform but this time around there are even robots that carry out the assigned task while you do not have to lift a finger ( that sounds interesting right?), so read through as I tell you more about this fascinating helpers.

I will be making use of pictures in this post as this will help in giving a detailed explanation about the topic discussed.

(1) Ever heard about autonomous lawnmower?
Just like the n
root_title: Technology has come to stay: Simple Robotic Appliances for Household Chores.

author: ajewa
title: Online Advertising as a Form of Marketing (The Introduction)
body:
Hello everyone,

In my previous post I talked about email marketing and I am glad you all liked it, I want to say a big thank you to everyone that keeps reading my post and to the @project.hope community for being supportive. Without no further delay and still on marketing and advertising, I will be looking at something virtually everyone is used to which is online advertisement.

You must have seen several pop ups from different companies and businesses trying to create an awareness about what they do while you are surfing the internet. In short and simple terms, Online advertisement is showcasing, making awareness and publicity of products, companies and businesses to the general public or their audience in other to cause an increase in sales. The major purpose of an advertisement either online or offline is to create awareness and to get positive response from their audience. 


![48929256067_634f714d0a_z.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmREnSjrGp298kqY2m8QVh9N8iLpVUPDBjhJydcB4e8yaX/48929256067_634f71
root_title: Online Advertising as a Form of Marketing (The Introduction)

author: ajewa
title: E-mail Marketing; The Simple, Easy Method for Online Marketing.
body:
Technology has changed a lot of things including in the real estate world. Before the internet boom and the year of technology, a simple post of “building for sale” on a stick board or a simple advert on the left corner of a newspaper was enough to get influx people and calls asking about the building but all this have changed. Everything has changed, if you do this now, you might not find a buyer. Realtor.com says that about 80% of buyers search for homes online and this goes down to other aspect of business. Unlike some years back when people make adverts through papers and bills, now every business is going online. 

![email-3543958_1280.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPX4YFDNy1d7H85VL7LTcLJwjCHXycHk2LAjzJSuq1DDC/email-3543958_1280.jpg)
*pixabay*


Have you been spammed by emails of companies and businesses trying to make you buying into their product or start using their services? If you have then you might understand what e-mail marketing is.

Before the dot com boom, a lot of people did not reall
root_title: E-mail Marketing; The Simple, Easy Method for Online Marketing.

author: ajewa
title: Personal Finance and questioning why schools do not teach it
body:
Have you ever thought about your life after school to be full of fantasies, I mean a life with no pain, no reason to learn how to handle money, a life where you do not need a mortgage only to realize when you are out in the real life that you are facing isn’t close to what you thought when you were in school. If you had that same thought, then you are not alone as I thought the same way too and I’m sure a lot of people thought the same way. 


![28471730824_ae1781516e_b.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWP9ekzDdKk4gUb3uk9gydLBJ11m5BdBpm7RYtYP62wKn/28471730824_ae1781516e_b.jpg)
*Flickr*

Did you have problem with dealing with figures when you were in college only to be out of school to start facing calculations about how much you have spent, deals on credit cards, calculating paying your rent, pay for your car as well as tax? Well that is reality, I mean the real world.

#### Were You Taught Personal Finance?
The difference between several homeschooled children and school trained children is financial edu
root_title: Personal Finance and questioning why schools do not teach it

author: ajewa
title: Robotic Process Automation
body:
I have heard a lot of people complain about their work and how hard they had to repeat the same thing all day. Thanks to science for Robotic process automation (RPA), a lot of people will not have to complain about repeating the same thing in their workplace rather they might have to complain about job loss. Anyway there is always a job to do.


![robotic-process-automation-powerful-examples.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdg77Q6f1AE9NQLoumR6UV8w6TMLBss5AHF6ULVMyVRLx/robotic-process-automation-powerful-examples.jpg)
[Source](https://datafloq.com/read/robotic-process-automation-powerful-examples/7034)

#### Robotic process automation 
This technology allows the configuration of computer software or bots (No physical robots involved) to emulate the actions of humans interacting with digital system so as to execute business process. Like I said before, there are no physical robots involved with Robotic process automation rather, robotic process automation involves automating using a software running on a
root_title: Robotic Process Automation
